snippet: In a sea of truthiness, fact-checking is a lifesaver.
abstract: Campaign Stops column by Politifact editor Angie Drobnic Holan reflects on fact-checking of statements made by presidential candidates in 2016 campaign cycle; suggests those who profess feeling dispirited by lack of factual accuracy on campaign trail should be encouraged by fact that exposure of falsehoods is clearly increasing as campaign season progresses toward November.
lead_paragraph: In a sea of truthiness, fact-checking is a lifesaver.

headline.print_headline: All Politicians Lie. Some Lie More Than Others.
headline.main: All Politicians Lie. Some Lie More Than Others.
